page.title: 13LEISURE TIME ACTIVITIES
page.content: Our survey asked, "What is your favourite leisure time activity?" LEISURE TIME NUMBER OF TIMES ACTIVITY. MENTIONED. Reading 16 Gardening 12 Television 7 Knitting 5 Walking 5 Amateur dramatics 3 Playing/listening to music. 2 Microcomputer 2 Many other activities were mentioned once only. Among them were fishing, golf, swimming, tennis, shooting, snooker, keep fit, dominoes, darts, pool, D.I.Y., tropical fish, travel, visiting places of interest, farming, sport, village activities, karting and creative crafts such as crochet, sewing, embroidery,tapestry,modelling.
